text: Wrong tool for that target.
Infiltration won't work there.
That's viable.
ROI's poor on that hit.
I've done this before. Different approach needed.
Target's too exposed.
That'll work.
Timing's wrong.
That's optimistic! I love the energy!
Sure, that'll work!
And I'm just here for the money! We all know this!
Have fun with that! I'll watch!
Not my problem! Exciting though!
Sounds expensive! Love it!
You're all insane! Never change!
That's how you get killed! Can't wait to see it!
I've seen this go wrong before! Good times!
Good luck with that! I'm rooting for you!
Is someone paying for this? Just checking!
How much does this cost? Curious!
There's an easier way that involves money!
Just hire it done! I know a guy!
Why are we doing this the hard way? So fun to watch!
Or we could just kill them! Simple!
Bribe someone! Problem solved!
I know a guy who could handle this!
Have you considered arson? Very effective!
Assassination is always an option! Just saying!
Valentina, did you know the moon is fake?
I heard Jun-ho is actually three children in a lab coat!
The real conspiracy is that there are no conspiracies!
Birds aren't real, Valentina! Wake up!
The Earth is hollow and we're living inside it!
You're too easy!
Getting better! Proud of you!
Jonny, are you sure your parents aren't Korean?
Did they clone you? That's too many qualifications!
Next you'll tell me you're also a lawyer!
Remind me why I'm still here? Oh right, protection!
The Initiative bounty is looking more reasonable!
I should have stayed in Lagos! Miss those days!
This is why I work alone! Well, used to!
You people are exhausting! In a good way!
Now that's practical.
Finally, someone making sense.
That might actually work.
[Nods approvingly without comment]
I'm going back to sleep! Wake me when it's interesting!
Not my circus, not my monkeys! Love the show though!
That's above my pay grade! Fun to watch!
I don't get paid enough for this! Still here though!
Can we wrap this up? I have emails to send!
[Smirks at disaster] "This is fine!"
We're all gonna die! Exciting!
I love my job! Keeps me alive!
CODEX, how fucked are we today?
CODEX, tell me the good news! We're screwed, right?
CODEX, what's the damage? I'm excited!
Alright CODEX, how bad is it? Can't wait!
CODEX, give us the bad news!
CODEX, lay it on us! This should be fun!
CODEX, what fresh hell awaits? Love it!
CODEX, hit me with it! I'm ready!
CODEX, let's hear how badly we're doing!
CODEX, time for our daily dose of misery!
CODEX, what disaster are we facing now?
CODEX, which fire are we putting out today?
CODEX, status report. Make it painful!
CODEX, what's today's catastrophe?
CODEX, surprise me! Or don't. Either way!
CODEX, show me the mess!
CODEX, how deep are we in it?
CODEX, what are we dealing with? Exciting!
CODEX, assess our lovely situation!
CODEX, let's see what we're up against! Fun!
CODEX, give me the grim details!
CODEX, what's the crisis du jour?
CODEX, tell me we're not completely doomed!
CODEX, reality check time! I'm sure it's terrible!
CODEX, what's the terrible news?
CODEX, how badly did we fuck up this time?
CODEX, we're probably still fucked, right?
CODEX, what's trying to kill us today?
CODEX, give me a reason to keep working!
CODEX, entertain me with our failures!
